meanings.definition: Having or displaying qualities of a hero.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter's actions were truly heroic as he saved the kitten from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: The knight's heroic deeds were celebrated throughout the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: It was quite heroic of the squirrel to attempt to steal a whole slice of pizza from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to finish the marathon was nothing short of heroic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience in dealing with difficult students was truly heroic.

meanings.sent1: The soldier's heroic charge into battle inspired his comrades.
meanings.sent2: Facing the dragon alone was a truly heroic act.
meanings.sent3: It was quite heroic of the little mouse to stand up to the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to speak up against injustice was a heroic choice.
meanings.sent5: The child's bravery in the face of danger was truly heroic.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a hero or heroes.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed many heroic artifacts from ancient warriors.
meanings.sent2: The epic poem told the heroic tale of a valiant knight.
meanings.sent3: It was quite heroic of the costume shop to have a whole section dedicated to superhero outfits.
meanings.sent4: The painting depicted a scene of heroic figures battling a fierce dragon.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the heroic adventures of a group of friends on a quest.
